text: Post-hoc analytic flexibility: scoring machinery defined after data exists creates researcher degrees of freedom
Judging protocol conflicts with FAIRNESS.md: 2-judge instead of 3-judge, no blinding, no human validation subset
Task element counts redefined post-hoc: L2-02 (8→11), L2-03 (5→9), L3-03 (5→22) change denominator and may alter winners
Prompt overhead acknowledged but not integrated into primary metric, can over-credit formats with larger instruction priors
Data reuse from Exp 0 changes estimand (including invalids vs valid-only) without deviation filing
Statistical model under-specified: ratio outcome with skew/heavy tails, no log-transform or GLMM policy pre-specified
Prereg model includes complexity_level fixed effect but Exp 1 draft omits it
Sample size 81 per condition below prereg target 162, above minimum 54 but power claim is weak
Element taxonomy not reproducible: 'some repo identifier', 'some reasoning', 'Receiver (any)' are non-deterministic
Density metric gameable by trivial element inflation, equal weighting of identity vs causal chain
Inconsistency between prereg (tokens ~ condition) and draft (tokens_per_unit ~ condition)
Calibration set of 18 outputs is thin relative to 486 total
Manual disagreement review protocol unspecified: who adjudicates, blinded or not, tie-break rules
No cluster-aware bootstrap plan: resampling unit unspecified
Human validation subset (30 items) required by FAIRNESS.md but absent from plan and response
Must run prereg-faithful analysis alongside expanded analysis (dual reporting per PREREGISTRATION.md:161)
Estimand contradiction: include invalids broadly but exclude zero-element outputs creates drift without two-part model
Blinding bias-check may be circular if ground truth comes from same judges being audited
LLM judge may systematically bias element extraction in favor of English conditions (understands English better than AXON)
Element count granularity varies 5.5x across tasks (4 to 22)
Prompt overhead not integrated into primary analysis
No repair cycle data collected (preregistered secondary endpoint unaddressed)
Density metric undefined for zero-element outputs
2-judge deviates from FAIRNESS.md 3-way protocol
No visualization plan specified
